Episodes.Title: Thomas and the Storyteller
Episodes.Plot: A famous storyteller is coming to the island to open a new library. Thomas is chosen to show her around Sodor to give her inspiration for a story she will read at the opening. Thomas collects her from Brendam and decides to take her to Pirate's Cove, but sees James with a broken coupling and pulls h

Episodes.Title: Emily's Rubbish
Episodes.Plot: Emily is asked to help a new engine called Whiff, but is mortified to discover he is scruffy and smelly and that the two are to collect rubbish trucks. Emily grudgingly sets off with Whiff, but is teased dreadfully when she meets Gordon, Henry and James.

Episodes.Title: Dirty Work
Episodes.Plot: James is delighted to be taking the Mayor of Sodor to the Festival of Lights. He tells his friends that he cannot help them with their jobs because he does not want to get dirty, but if he does not help them, they will miss the festival.

Episodes.Title: Hector the Horrid
Episodes.Plot: Bill and Ben bring a new coal hopper, Hector, to the coal yards, and warn Thomas that he is very aggressive. Hector proves that point when Thomas tries to shunt him, to which he replies by roaring "KEEP AWAY!"

Episodes.Title: Gordon and the Engineer
Episodes.Plot: The points are jammed and Gordon is asked to collect an engineer from Maron. Upon his arrival, he is told that Bertie is bringing more passengers, but Gordon is impatient and sets off with who he thinks is the engineer.

Episodes.Title: Thomas and the Spaceship
Episodes.Plot: Percy sees some flashing lights in the sky and is convinced they're a spaceship.

Episodes.Title: Cool Truckings
Episodes.Plot: Thomas has arrived at the Transfer Yards to collect some coal, but snow has blocked the line and Duncan is unable to shunt the coal trucks into place.

Episodes.Title: Thomas and the Lighthouse
Episodes.Plot: Thomas is given a big job during the big fireworks display.

Episodes.Title: Skarloey Storms Through
Episodes.Plot: When a storm comes to the hills of Sodor, the little narrow gauge engines are called to help bring the sheep to safety. Skarloey is frightened and whilst Rheneas and Peter Sam puff up and down with the sheep, Skarloey hides.
